passage_text: The average costs of these supplies is $2.42 to $2.80 per square foot of a mosaic glass tile backsplash. Professional installers are also needed to install this type of backsplash because installation involves heavy duty equipment. The average cost of one hour of labor for a mosaic glass tile backsplash is $38 to $50.

Supplies such as grout and tile adhesive add an average of $1.48 per finished square foot of backsplash. The average hourly cost of labor for experienced tile installers to cut and place the tiles is $71.50. These installation costs are for a basic square or rectangular layout of the

1 On average, installing a backsplash can range in price from $13 to as much as $24 per square foot. 2  This will not include the tile and supplies, but is for installation only. 3  For example, a 25 square foot space could cost anywhere from $325 to as much as $600.

The cost to install backsplash averages $23.52 – $40.28 per square foot based on data 2014 from homewyse.com. The cost divides into three subjects such as average material costs, unit labor productivity rates and also national average hourly labor wages.
